job_title: Staff Scientist II in Atlanta, TX
pros: Benefits are wonderful and people are friendly

Small, rural hospital with some great talent; highly trained physicians are attracted to MMH and Montrose due to the draw of fabulous outdoor opportunities and a lower cost of living (for them) than Denver or other big cities. Up-to-date technologies like 3D mammogram and robotic assisted surgery which is fabulous for a small town. Great cafeteria food (their restaurant is even on Yelp). Patients are incredible and staff is super welcoming and take their jobs very seriously. Everyone knows everyone which leads to some great relationships in spite of some immature and petty behavior from some.
cons: Poorly trained clinic managers who seem to believe that everyone is replaceable. Some units are cliquey, especially if you were not born and raised in Montrose. Lots of turnover, yet many of the managers who do not leave are a huge part of the problem. Resistance to change seems common, especially when suggested by newcomers from larger hospitals.
Covid has decreased their benefits significantly.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Montrose, CO
pros: Friends and family helping friends and family.
cons: Lack of some resources due to rural area

pros: If you like a small hospital with that friendly, hometown feel, it’s a great place to work. Excellent facility for the size of the community, co-workers are friendly and there is very much a team mentality.
cons: Not much support from unit management; they are absent often and when present, micromanaging is an issue. Only room for advancement if you know the right people, not based of your education or experience.

review_title: Mostly a positive family oriented experience
cons: problems with several managers and a few employees ethics

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Pratt, KS
pros: I enjoy helping others. Elder care experience. Hospice care experience.
cons: Not any I can think of off hand

review_title: they don't treat employees very well.
pros: You only advance if you know the right person
